description:
Distortion free viewing from a slick rim-less goggle with cutting-edge lenses. With its high-contrast ChromaPop® lens and rim-less design, the Skyline offers and expansive field of view. Built on Smith’s Responsive Fit™ frame and equipped with 3-layer foam these goggles feel light and comfortable from your first run to your last.

  • Designed for medium faces
  • ChromaPop lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast, and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions
  • Spherical Carbonic-X lens has crisp TLT optics for distortion free viewing and a 5X anti-fog inner lens
  • Thermal lens eliminates fog during rapid elevation changes
  • Utilizes Smith’s Responsive Fit design, making the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing the frame to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes all while reducing weight
  • 3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system and a clip buckle
  • Includes a microfiber goggle bag
name: Smith Skyline Goggles - Unisex
